more_content:
The Mermaid Festival will find its land legs this summer in Key West! The inaugural “fin-tastic” event will celebrate mermaids while promoting ocean awareness in the Conch Republic on July 5-7.

The family-friendly gathering begins Friday, July 5th. At 24 North Hotel, we will be hosting a special “Under the Sea” display for the festivities with mermaid-inspired art at the Sunset Green Event Lawn from 6 pm to 10 pm.

Friday’s kick-off events will clear the way for the Mermaid Fest parade on Saturday, which starts at 11 am on Duval Street. The mermaid parade will scale its way down Key West’s famous passage to the Truman Waterfront Park Amphitheater.

Once the parade arrives at the Truman Waterfront, visitors, mer-people and locals will find mermaid-inspired entertainment and vendors. This event will run from noon to 6 pm.

The next day, mingle with the mermaids during the “Sunday Funday with Mermaids” at Lagerheads Beach Bar at 0 Simonton St. Starting at noon, visitors can enjoy food and drink, face painting, vendors and music all connected to the world of mermaids.

The event focused on mermaids, ocean conservation and safely swimming with a mermaid tail is fun for the whole family! Plan a Fourth of July trip to Key West, which coincides with the Conch Republic’s favorite dessert event: The Annual Key Lime Festival!

Book direct with 24 North

We have a special offer for rooms booked during Mermaid Fest! Guests can enjoy 15% off their stay. Read more. 

24 North Hotel is located in Key West and offers hourly shuttle service to Mallory Square in Old Town. There, you can find the renowned Sloppy Joe’s Bar on Duval Street, the Hemingway Home & Museum, the Southernmost Point of the continental United States, and more. Intrigued? Read 24 reasons why you want to plan Key West as your next vacation destination here.

Cut out the middle-man so there’s no unexpected hiccups on the day of your check-in. Before you book, browse our specials here to see which one works best for you – if you book 40 days in advance you can enjoy a discount of up to 20%!
title: The Mermaid Festival Makes Landfall in Key West

blogimage.description: a woman with a mermaid tail looks out at the beach
